preqs: ATS2006, ATS2026, ATS3006, ATS3026 or equivalent or permission

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APG5027, ATS3027, ATS4027}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1006, ATS1026, ATS2006, ATS2026, ATS3006, ATS3026}
(Must have passed a unit in {ATS2006, ATS2026, ATS3006, ATS3026} OR  Permission required)

description: This unit will introduce students to a range of texts of different genres in contemporary Chinese. Students' ability to understand contemporary China and their skills of speaking, listening and writing will be further developed through reading, translation practice, essay-writing and other activities.
